import React,{useState}from'react';import'./WorkGrid.css';import INFO from'../../data/user';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WorkGrid=()=>{// Extract unique categories from projects data
const allCategories=[...new Set(INFO.projects.map(project=>project.category))];const categories=['All',...allCategories];const[activeCategory,setActiveCategory]=useState('All');const filteredProjects=activeCategory==='All'?INFO.projects:INFO.projects.filter(project=>project.category===activeCategory);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"work",className:"work-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Selected Works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"A collection of my latest projects"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-filter",children:categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:activeCategory===category?'active':'',onClick:()=>setActiveCategory(category),children:category},category))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work-grid",children:filteredProjects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-image-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.thumbnail,alt:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:project.title==="The Abuse of a Flower"?"long-title":"",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[project.category," | ",project.year]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"view-project",children:"View Project"})]})})]})},index))})]})});};export default WorkGrid;
